SEARCH
Package userInterface

Class ScheduleUI

java.lang.Object
userInterface.ScheduleUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScheduleInterface
public class ScheduleUI extends Object implements ScheduleInterface
The class implements ScheduleInterface to provide a user interface for managing doctor schedules. This class allows doctors to view, set, add, and remove time slots from their schedules.

It interacts with the ScheduleManager to handle the schedule data and ensures that the input is validated for consistency and correctness. Doctors can set their available time slots for future dates, and the class ensures that there are no conflicts with existing schedules.

  • Method Details

    • viewSchedule

      public void viewSchedule(Doctor doctor)
      Displays the schedule for a given doctor.

      This method retrieves and displays the doctor's schedule, showing the available time slots for the doctor, if any.

      Specified by:
      viewSchedule in interface ScheduleInterface
      Parameters:
      doctor - The Doctor whose schedule is to be viewed.

    • setSchedule

      public void setSchedule(Scanner sc, Doctor doctor)
      Sets a schedule for the doctor.

      This method allows the doctor to set their available time slots for a future date. The user must input the date and available time slots, which will be validated before being added to the schedule.

      Specified by:
      setSchedule in interface ScheduleInterface
      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner object used to capture user input.
      doctor - The Doctor who is setting their schedule.

    • areTimeSlotsOneHourApart

      public boolean areTimeSlotsOneHourApart(List<LocalTime> timeSlots)
      Validates that all time slots are 1 hour apart.
      Parameters:
      timeSlots - The list of time slots to be checked.
      Returns:
      True if all time slots are 1 hour apart, otherwise false.

    • addSchedule

      public void addSchedule(LocalDate date, LocalTime time, Doctor doctor)
      Adds a single time slot to the doctor's schedule.

      This method checks if the time slot is valid and adds it to the schedule for the given date.

      Specified by:
      addSchedule in interface ScheduleInterface
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the schedule.
      time - The time slot to be added.
      doctor - The Doctor whose schedule is being updated.

    • addSchedule

      public void addSchedule(LocalDate date, List<LocalTime> timeSlots, Doctor doctor)
      Adds multiple time slots to the doctor's schedule.

      This method ensures that all the time slots are valid and adds them to the schedule for the given date. If the date already has a schedule, the new time slots are added to the existing schedule.

      Parameters:
      date - The date of the schedule.
      timeSlots - The list of time slots to be added.
      doctor - The Doctor whose schedule is being updated.

    • removeSchedule

      public void removeSchedule(LocalDate date, LocalTime time, Doctor doctor)
      Removes a time slot from the doctor's schedule.
      Specified by:
      removeSchedule in interface ScheduleInterface
      Parameters:
      date - The date of the schedule.
      time - The time slot to be removed.
      doctor - The Doctor whose schedule is being updated.
